panel.title: ILS Automation Installer for Custom EMC Modules
panel.preamble: Welcome to the ILS Automation installer for ExxonMobil Chemicals built-from-source modules. This installer is designed to be applied to an existing installation. It merely updates BLT and ILS-SFC modules. The table below compares the existing installation of built-from-source modules, if any, with the versions contained in this new installation.

panel.title: Install Custom Modules
panel.preamble: This step installs modules necessary for the EMC applications. IMPORTANT: If this is the first time that you have installed these modules on your system, they will be placed in quarantine mode. To complete the installation, you will have to navigate to the Modules page and select the install option next to the listing of each module.

panel.title: Installation Summary
panel.preamble: The list below shows which of the installation steps have been completed. Selecting "Finish" will record the current version of ACE Ignition Applications in the Gateway internal database.

epilog.title: Installation Complete
epilog.preamble: The automated installation and configuration of the ACE Control Ignition Application is complete. There are just a few more manual steps required.
epilog.note: Modules with active components have been installed. A Gateway restart is required.
